segments.text: I watch the water cascade over the cabinets, pooling beneath the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a vivid reminder that even the simplest tasks can lead to chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues drying the plate, unaware of the mounting risk around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself torn between fascination and concern for the children’s risky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s foot slips slightly on the stool, and my heart races.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to scream, to alert her, to stop this madness before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, in this moment, I’m just a silent observer, watching as time creeps forward.
segments.speaker: PAR
